title: Dear Mona Are There Any Other Men Who Don’t Watch Sports FiveThirtyEight » DataLab | FiveThirtyEight

type_specific.selection: Dear Mona, I watch no sports year-round. None. Zero. I know I am not alone. A few of my friends also watch no sports. So, what percentage of men in the USA watch no sports? Fred, 45, Chester Springs, Pennsylvania Dear Fred, You’re right that you’re not alone. For me, watching sports is like watching […]
